plot: A convicted murderer is released from prison. At his homecoming dinner he forces his brother and sister to face the secrets of their past.
title: Lovelock, CA
plot_es: A convicted murderer is released from prison. At his homecoming dinner he forces his brother and sister to face the secrets of their past.
plot_en: A convicted murderer is released from prison. At his homecoming dinner he forces his brother and sister to face the secrets of their past.
